com.xtructure.xutil.valid
Class ValidateUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.xtructure.xutil.valid.ValidateUtils

public final class ValidateUtils
extends java.lang.Object

A set of utilities to validate arguments, states, or test assertions.

Author:
Luis Guimbarda, Peter Nürnberg
